text: "Bring It Back" is a song by the American rap group Travis Porter, released on February 7, 2011 as the second single from their first studio album, From Day 1 (2012). It is their second song to chart on the Billboard Hot 100, entering at #69 in the week ending April 1, 2011, and has since peaked at #75. The official remix version features fellow rapper Too Short, appears as a bonus track on the group's mixtape Music, Money, Magnums. ==Background and composition== The song was produced by FKi & DJ Spinz, who also produced the group's previous single "Make It Rain": however, unlike that song, "Bring It Back" has a more upbeat production, rather than a slower, crunk track. ==Remixes== *Tyga * Too Short *Cali Swag District ==Music video== The music video was released to YouTube on March 16, 2011. ==Track listing== ;US digital single ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !align="left"|Chart (2011) ! style="text-align:center;"|Peak position |- | align="left" |US Billboard Hot 100 (Billboard) | style="text- align:center;" |69 |- | align="left" |US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs (Billboard) | style="text-align:center;"|18 |- | align="left" |US Rap Songs (Billboard) | style="text-align:center;"|14 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2011 singles Category:Travis Porter songs Category:2011 songs Category:Jive Records singles Category:Songs written by DJ Spinz
title: Bring It Back (Travis Porter song)
